item.description:
At our next potluck dinner, we will be hearing from Jennie Thompson about past lives. We will also be able to participate in a past life regression if we wish.

I hope you can join us in our ever growing group... although there are 8 members here, our last event, the conference, had 28 people attending!

So bring a dish of food and be ready to share great fellowship and gain new knowledge!

Please RSVP... thanks!

dance in the light,

susan gale

The Potluck is held at 374 Main Street in Cherry Valley, MA

For more information, see http://www.placeoflig...
item.name: When did you know your children before?
